description: Used to link to an some online resource

Title.description: A short, descriptive label for this link

AltTitle.description: A list of language-specific titles for the link

Relation.description: Term from the IANA rel vocabulary for consistency with IETF 5988

BaseProtocol.description: Internet protocol from IETF registry at http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfcxx00.html

MIMEType.description: MIME type of the linked resource. From IANA registry at http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/application/index.html

ResponseSchema.description: A URI that specifies the content-type, e.g. an XML schema namespace URI

Length.description: Advisory length of the linked resource

HrefLanguage.description: The language of the linked resource
